articles.title: China risks being ‘isolated’ from rest of world, says Asia’s richest person - South China Morning Post
articles.description: Speaking at a conference in Singapore, Gautam Adani said China’s “increasing nationalism, supply chain risk mitigation and technology restrictions” would likely affect its connectivity with other economies.
